/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of looking up at the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The street is lined with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, hinting at the busy life of the city. The sun shines brightly in the blue sky, casting a warm glow over the scene.
